segments.text: From my view, the sunlight highlights the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back, showing the tidy yard beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the faucet runs unchecked, overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down onto the floor, widening the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, completely absorbed and unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how she misses the danger at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool, body stretched toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is inside the cookie jar, pilfering sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs splay out, unstable and risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll fall hard onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches intently, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's part of this little rebellion against the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this while the garden outside remains serene and untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before something breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment captures innocence mixed with impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
